Posts.Content: Teachskincare1 wrote: I need some help from those of you who have gone through what I am getting ready to go through.  I've met both my surgeons and their recommendation is a double mastectomy.  I've researched until I'm blue in the face and at first the double mastectomy seemed the most logical choice.  But now 10 short days before my surgery, I'm having second thoughts.  I KNOW THIS IS MY CHOICE, but I need some input as to what you would do if you were me.  BRAC 1 & 2 came back negative so I don't understand why I would need a bilateral or a single mastectomy at all and refuse to let fear be the main reason.  Thanks for your time.  Dx 3/23/2010, DCIS, Stage 0 Log in to post a reply
